channel.title: Podcasts in iTunes
channel.description: I downloaded version 4.9 of iTunes today that contains support for Podcasts. Overall it seems ok, very easy to use but no support for Bittorrent which means I'll be sticking with nimiq for a while yet to keep up to...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Carl Franklin+00:00
item.description:
.NET Rocks! no longer requires bittorrent for podcast downloading. It's both a blessing and a curse, as we're once again maxed out, bandwidth-wise. As soon as BitTorrent goes into iTunes, we'll switch back.
Carl
item.dc:creator: Carl Franklin
